headline: Citi Trims Mid-America Apartment Communities (MAA) Target Amid Multifamily Sector Uncertainty
summary: Mid-America Apartment Communities, Inc. (NYSE:MAA) is included among the 14 Best Real Estate Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. Top 100 Places Where the Rich People Own Real Estate On February 13, Citi trimmed its price recommendation on Mid-America Apartment Communities, Inc. (NYSE:MAA) to $148 from $155. The firm maintained a Neutral rating on […]
